channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 11:19 Attack Dronov-Kamikadzerukh on the old part
item.description: 🟠 11:19 Attack Dronov-Kamikadzerukh on the old part This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

A 24 -hour free hotline for evacuation of civilian population - 0800339291#Kupyansky_ region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
